name: VREZ
description:
This is my entry to Leap Motion #3DJam

It's VR tribute to Dreamcast game Rez

Currently work in progress. Not very rezy out of rhythm but will work on that :)

Probably works only on Oculus SDK 0.6. Can't compile and test it on 0.7 because my laptop doesn't work with it :)

UPDATE! New binary works on Oculus SDK 1.3 + Leap Motion ORION!

Currently no Image Hands in this version

Controls:

R - Reset tracking (face oculus camera with headset on and press R after you start the game)

You use your hands to lock enemies, make fist to fire. Shoot down bombs before they reach you.
